# .NET MAUI Patterns

> Enterprise application patterns for .NET MAUI cross-platform development. Covers MVVM architecture, dependency injection, navigation, validation, and platform-specific customization. .NET MAUI enables building native mobile and desktop apps from a single C# codebase.

*Topics available: 14*

- [Accessing Remote Data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/accessing-remote-data.md): Communicating with Web APIs in .NET MAUI
- [Application Settings Management](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/app-settings-management.md): Managing persistent configurations in .NET MAUI
- [Authentication and Authorization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/authentication-and-authorization.md): Providing security and identity management for .NET MAUI application
- [Communicating Between Components](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/communicating-between-components.md): Providing loosely-coupled messaging for a .NET MAUI application
- [Dependency Injection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/dependency-injection.md): Patterns for building flexible, decoupled, and testable applications
- [Enterprise Application Patterns Using .NET MAUI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/index.md): Learn how to design adaptable, maintainable, and testable MAUI applications.
- [Introduction to .NET MAUI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/introduction.md): Introduction to enterprise architecture for .NET MAUI
- [Containerized Microservices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/micro-services.md): Strategies for developing scalable back-end architecture
- [MVVM Toolkit Features](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/mvvm-community-toolkit-features.md): Helper components to simplify app development and maintenance
- [Model-View-ViewModel](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/mvvm.md): Overview of the Model-View-ViewModel pattern used by .NET MAUI
- [Navigation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/navigation.md): Managing Navigation in a .NET MAUI Application
- [A preface to enterprise architecture for MAUI applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/preface.md): Guidance for what the book will cover, reference materials, and how to approach the book.
- [Unit Testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/unit-testing.md): Learn how to provide application testing and improve code quality in .NET MAUI.
- [Validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/validation.md): Provide feedback and checks to ensure data is correct at runtime
